text:
[Verse]
Under the moonlight we walk tonight
Whispers of starlight hold us tight
Chasing our shadows hand in hand
Dreams in the night like grains of sand

[Verse 2]
Waves of the ocean kiss the shore
Counting the dreams we can't ignore
Winds in the night they play their song
Feel our hearts where we belong

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight so bright
We find our love in the night
Heartbeats dance to the tune
Magic under the moon

[Verse 3]
Stars in the sky guide our way
Lost in the night no need for day
Eyes closed tight in this bliss
Seal our love with a midnight kiss

[Bridge]
Time stands still in this moment
Whispers come so potent
Feel the magic take flight
All beneath tender moonlight

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight so bright
We find our love in the night
Heartbeats dance to the tune
Magic under the moon
title: Under the Moonlight
